page.title: 08WestGate Farm,Gt.Walsingham
page.content: Arable farm,{371 acres},owned by John Gurney(Walsingham Estate Co.)tennant{ {B.Landale}the rent being{Â£34 per acre} Crops grown are Winter and Spring Barley for animal feed or malt,Winter Wheat for animal feed,Sugar Beet to produce sugar and 7 acres{daffodils}to multiply bulbs.Grass meadows are let.Wells_Walsingham{Light Railway} (10.5"gauge) runs through the farm,mainly a tourist attraction transporting over{30,000}passengers during the summer season.Farmed by Brian Landale,married with a daughter,Justice of the Peace and Parish Councillor.Farm comprises WestGate and Model Farms and 18 acres from a small holding,{one man employed (Â£6,000p.a.)using 3 tractors plus ancillary equipment a combine harvester.In living memory{14 {employed}.
